content: gummy worm single_crochet=single_crochet chain=chain measures approximately 5 tall and is mc=main colour st=stitch approximately 1 wide this pattern is cc=complimentary colour magic_ring=magic_ring meant to be a tiny plush keychain that is slip_stitch=slip_stitch fo=fasten_off small enough to attach to a bag purse or anything you want to adorn with yo=yarn over extra cuteness perfect for your sour inv decrease=invisible decrease candy loving friends as a quick gift head/body picture guide using 1st color and 5mm hook 1 magic_ring + single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 6scs 2 increase single_crochet in next st *repeat around 9scs 3-4 single_crochet around 9scs *weave in magic_ring tail or tie two tight knots using the tail on inside + trim tail approx 1 ½ then add eyes between rounds 3&4 approximately 1 stitch apart from each other *stuff the worm s head a little 5 single_crochet 3 inv decrease single_crochet inv decrease single_crochet 7scs 6-9 single_crochet around 7scs *continue stuffing as you go using a stuffing tool pen or chopstick 10 single_crochet around in last stitch you can change color to the 2nd color or simply continue with the same color if you are making a solid color worm 7scs 11 single_crochet around 7scs *tie off tails from color change with a knot then a slip knot over that to secure then trim tails approximately to 1 ½ long alternatively weave in tails normally and trim tails from color change and hide inside body 12-19 single_crochet around 7scs *continue stuffing *after round 19 sl st then fasten_off and using the tail close the tip of the worm s tail *using the same tail again pull the bottom part of the worm into shape by sewing part of the outside of the worm together see pictures for guidance *using a strand of the 1st color of yarn + sewing needle sew part of the top of the worm on the outside to pull it into shape *on the opposite side from the last one you just did this will create an s shape *weave in tails & you re almost done now we will attach the keychain if you do not want the sour gummy worm to be a keychain just skip that part and you are finished see picture guide bellow for help 1 using the black cotton yarn or yarn of your choice attach the keychain ring to the sour gummy worm a i began by threading the yarn on my needle poked inside the right side of head and back out the middle top of magic_ring of head b slip keychain onto needle and thread c then back in the head one stitch away from where you just came out pulling out the needle through the same space you entered in part a of instructions cut the thread loop 4th picture bellow d tie the tails together 3x to secure well then weave back into body to hide or you can use your hook to pull tail inside of plush tip there is no wrong way
